name: HKGolden Dark Theme
description:
Dark and material theme for hkgolden.com.
-Things that got removed
--Control panel
--Second-hand market
--Google search
--SOME of the space that ad-blocker left behind
--Bunch of useless things at the end of the page
--Monthly star vote
-Things that got changed
--Background for most pages
--some non-essential icons (like those on the left of the topics panel)
--"favourite" , "report", "fast quote" buttons materialize, "quote" button removed
